word_mean_info__list.difference: 指朦胧出现，好像从雾中浮现出来一样。

word_group.brief_definition: 突然出现；忽然出现；突然显现

bilingual.source: New jobs appear and some jobs disappear.
bilingual.target: 新的工作出现，一些工作消失。

bilingual.source: On the landscapes of Australia the weirdest shapes appear.
bilingual.target: 在澳大利亚的景观上出现了最奇怪的形状。

bilingual.source: How many times does zero appear in 1,000 and 1,000,000?
A rainbow will appear after the rain.
The stars appear in the sky at night.
bilingual.target: 夜晚天空中会出现星星。

bilingual.source: Her name did not appear on the list.
bilingual.target: 她的名字在名单上没有出现。

bilingual.source: The stars began to appear in the night sora.
bilingual.target: 夜晚天空中开始出现星星。

bilingual.source: Stress can sometimes cause pimples to appear.
bilingual.target: 压力有时会导致粉刺出现。

bilingual.source: The kitten squat and waits for the mouse to appear.
bilingual.target: 小猫蹲着等待老鼠出现。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't need you to guess. I need you to know. Now, when did the symptoms first appear?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不是要你猜，我要你确定，第一次出现症状是在什么时候？

yingyinNormal.en: If influenza was only contagious after symptoms appear, it would have died out thousands of years ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果流感只有在症状出现后才会感染，那它早该在几千年前就消失了。

yingyinNormal.en: My arduous journey, however, was for naught. Although advertised to appear, he did not show up. It was at that moment, I vowed eternal hatred for Wil Wheaton.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而我艰苦的旅行却一无所获，尽管广告说他会出现，却最终没来，就在那一刻，我发誓要永远憎恨威尔·惠顿。

yingyinNormal.en: You do appear right on the cusp of something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在职场上可真是炙手可热。

yingyinNormal.en: We appear to have reached an impasse. I agree.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看来我们陷入了僵局。同意。

yingyinNormal.en: What? What? We appear to have angered it. We? We angered it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？我们似乎惹火它了。我们惹火它了？

yingyinNormal.en: It would appear that the children have stolen the drug money.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看起来是这俩孩子偷了毒资。

yingyinNormal.en: It would appear as if the phone companies have been lying to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看来电话公司一直在骗我。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, from my perspective, that's how you two appear to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，在我看来你们俩也是鬼祟男。

yingyinNormal.en: "They"? Mm. And whoever they are, they appear to be looking out for us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们吗？嗯，不论他们是谁，很显然他们是在帮助我们。

yingyinNormal.en: Your blood pressure is elevated. You appear to be distressed. I'm fine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你现在血压偏高，你看起来很痛苦。我没事。

yingyinNormal.en: My story would appear to be ended. Now, tell me yours. Did you steal it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的故事好像结束了，现在，和我说说你的故事。是你偷了它吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Like us, they appear to have a population growth rate that's unsustainable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 向我们一样，他们也有过度的人口增长。

yingyinNormal.en: Leonard, The Transformers teach us that things are not always what they appear to be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，变形金刚告诉我们事情的真相往往与其外在表现不同。

yingyinNormal.en: Dave needs to appear casual as he is transferred from his room to the broadcast facility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 戴夫在从房间去直播室的时候要保持平静。

yingyinNormal.en: Since my customary farewell would appear awfully self serving. I shall simply say good luck.
yingyinNormal.zh: 既然我这完全是自私自利的永别，我只想对你说，好运。

yingyinNormal.en: Users with the most visited threads are rewarded with online icons that appear next to their names.
yingyinNormal.zh: 帖子访问量最高的用户会获得奖赏，即显示在用户名旁边的一个网络图标。

yingyinNormal.en: Now it's gonna sound ridiculous at first, but the longer I talk the more rational it's going to appear. Yeah?
yingyinNormal.zh: 一开始听着肯定会觉得很荒唐，但是往下听，就会越来越觉得合理。是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: They had to live off the colors of light left over. This made them appear green. These were the green bacteria.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它们只能依靠水体深处残存的光线生存，而这使得它们呈绿色，这就是绿细菌。

yingyinNormal.en: You have to do this. Eurus will kill her! It doesn't appear we have a choice. Right, then. Countdown's starting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你必须这么做。欧罗斯会杀了她的。看起来我们别无选择。那好，倒计时开始。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 出现; 体现; 抵达

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不见；消失；不复存在；失踪；被杀害；丢失；被盗；不再使用
v. 消失；看不见；不再存在；不再使用；丢失；无法找到；失踪；被杀害
n. 面貌；外表；外观；参演；参与；露面；到来；出现；产生；问世

word_family.mean: v. 进入视野；出现；显现；看上去；留下…的印象；产生；体现；问世；开始被使用；出版

examination_example.sentence: For the low-sympathy kids, how much they shared <highlight>appeared</highlight> to turn on how inclined they were to feel guilty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于缺乏同情心的孩子来说，他们分享了多少似乎取决于他们有多倾向于感到内疚。

examination_example.sentence: Competition law <highlight>appears</highlight> to be the only way to address these imbalances of power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 竞争法似乎是解决这些权力失衡的唯一途径。

examination_example.sentence: For now it <highlight>appears</highlight> the economy is creating jobs at a decent pace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就目前而言，经济似乎正在以体面的速度创造就业机会。

sense_info_list.en: come into sight; come into existence; feature or be shown; arrive at a place
sense_info_list.zh: 出现; 体现; 抵达

examination_example.sentence: When the recovery began, worker shortages first <highlight>appeared</highlight> in the high-skilled trades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当经济开始复苏时，劳动力短缺首先出现在高技能行业。

examination_example.sentence: Now shortages are <highlight>appearing</highlight> at the mid-skill levels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，中等技能水平的人才出现短缺。

examination_example.sentence: It said that Internet Explorer 10, the version due to <highlight>appear</highlight> with Windows 8, would have DNT as a default.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司表示，将与Windows 8一起发布的IE10浏览器将把DNT（禁止追踪）设置为默认选项。

examination_example.sentence: The comic novel, The Posthumous Papers of the Pickwick Club, <highlight>appeared</highlight> serially in 1836 and 1837 and was first published in book form in 1837.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 喜剧小说《匹克威克外传》在1836到1837年间以连载的方式刊登，并于1837年首次集结成书出版。

examination_example.sentence: Soon after Sketches by Boz <highlight>appeared</highlight>, a publishing firm approached Dickens to write a story in monthly installments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在《博兹札记》出版后不久，一家出版公司找到狄更斯，要他以每月分期付款的方式写一个故事。

examination_example.sentence: From then on his sketches, which <highlight>appeared</highlight> under the pen name "Boz" in The Evening Chronicle, earned him a modest reputation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那之后，他以“博兹”为笔名在《晚间纪事》上发表的短篇小说，为他赢得了一定的赞誉。

sense_info_list.en: take part in a film, play, television programme, or others

word_usage.usage: appear作动词表示“显得；看来；似乎”时，通常不用于进行时。

作系动词表示“看似、看上去”时：
appear尤指从所知或所见得到某种印象，常后接动词不定式或that引导的表语从句，常可与seem换用。
look侧重由视觉得出某种印象，后接as if引导的表语从句时常可与seem换用。
seem侧重指由主观看法得出判断，但暗示有一定的依据。
可用作系动词，后接形容词，指看起来……。
作不及物动词时，appear to do sth.指看起来在做某事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不见；消失；不复存在；失踪；被杀害；丢失；被盗；不再使用
v. 消失；看不见；不再存在；不再使用；丢失；无法找到；失踪；被杀害
n. 面貌；外表；外观；参演；参与；露面；到来；出现；产生；问世

word_family.mean: v. 进入视野；出现；显现；看上去；留下…的印象；产生；体现；问世；开始被使用；出版

sense_info_list.en: come into sight; come into existence; arrive at a place

examination_example.sentence: Marconi's career was devoted to making wireless communication happen with an elegance that would <highlight>appear</highlight> to be intuitive and uncomplicated to the user.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 马可尼的职业生涯致力于让无线通信以一种优雅的方式进行，对用户来说似乎是直观和简单的。

examination_example.sentence: More CGI-recreated images of deceased celebrities are expected to <highlight>appear</highlight> on screen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 预计更多通过计算机成像技术（CGI）重现的已故名人的图像将出现在屏幕上。

examination_example.sentence: Traffic jams often <highlight>appear</highlight> where no one has enough information to avoid them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 交通堵塞经常出现，没有人有足够的信息来避开他们。

examination_example.sentence: This last finding would <highlight>appear</highlight> to contradict another popular hypothesis that it is our burdening of students with assignment that is causing all the problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后这个研究发现似乎否定了另外一个流行假说，该假说认为学生的课业负担是一切问题的根源。

examination_example.sentence: The resulting steel <highlight>appears</highlight> to achieve a combination of strength and toughness that is comparable to that of modern steels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所得的钢似乎实现了强度和韧性的组合，这与现代钢相当。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>appears</highlight> that Americans were economically much better off than the French on average.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看起来美国似乎比法国平均经济好得多。

examination_example.sentence: Those simultaneous challenges <highlight>appear</highlight> less overwhelming with increasingly better answers to a centuries-old question; how to make power portable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从古至今，人们一直在探索如何让电力便携化。如今，人们找到了回答这一问题的更好的答案，那些伴随新技术发展而来的诸多挑战也就没那么严峻了。

examination_example.sentence: The papers were categorized as neuroscience if the study <highlight>appeared</highlight> in a journal that had "neuroscience" or a related term in its title.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果该研究发表在标题中有“神经科学”或相关术语的期刊上，那么这些论文就被归类为神经科学。

examination_example.sentence: In 2004, a paper <highlight>appeared</highlight> in the journal Psychological Science, titled "Music Lessons Enhance IQ."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2004年，《心理科学》杂志上发表了一篇题为《音乐课提高智商》的论文。

sense_info_list.en: take part in a film, play, television programme, or others

word_usage.usage: appear用作系动词，接“to be+ n./adj. ” 或者介词短语、动词不定式或as if/though引导的从句，to be可以省略。当形容词是表语形容词时，to be不可省略。
appear用作系动词时，只能与形容词连用，不能与副词连用。

appear作“出现”解时，是不及物动词，不能与形容词连用。
他常常是不速之客，而且来了坐下就吃。
误 He often appeared unexpected and invited himself to lunch.
正 He often appeared unexpectedly and invited himself to lunch.
appear不能用于进行时，可用一般现在时表示目前的状况。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 强调公开露面, 被看见。
指朦胧出现, 好像从雾中浮现出来一样。

n. 面貌；外表；外观；参演；参与；露面；到来；出现；产生；问世

word_family.mean: v. 进入视野；出现；显现；看上去；留下…的印象；产生；体现；问世；开始被使用；出版

examination_example.sentence: Simply put, countries stick to darker and more conservative colors because they <highlight>appear</highlight> more official.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简单地说，国家坚持使用更暗、更保守的颜色，因为它们看起来更正式。

examination_example.sentence: These beasts of the sea do display a vast range of highly refined behaviors that <highlight>appear</highlight> to be driving their genetic development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些海兽确实会表现出各式各样非常“有教养”的行为，这些行为似乎推动了它们的基因的进化。

examination_example.sentence: Like cats, babies <highlight>appear</highlight> to engage in what's called "preferential looking"— looking longer at things that are interesting or unusual than things they perceive as normal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和猫一样，婴儿似乎也会进行所谓的“优先寻找”，即比起它们认为正常的事物，它们看有趣或不寻常的事物的时间更长。

sense_info_list.en: come into sight; come into existence; arrive at a place

examination_example.sentence: Songdo <highlight>appears</highlight> in the most famous music video ever to come out of South Korea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 松岛出现在那段最著名的产自韩国的音乐视频里。

examination_example.sentence: His name was Marie-Antoine Careme, and he had <highlight>appeared</highlight>, one day, almost out of nowhere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的名字叫 Marie-Antoine Careme，有一天，他几乎一无所获。他有一天不知道从哪儿出现的。

examination_example.sentence: Just beyond St. Mark's Square, a cruise ship passes, one of hundreds every year that <highlight>appear</highlight> over their medieval (中世纪的) surroundings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在圣马克广场(St. Mark's Square)的正上方，有一艘游轮经过，每年有数百艘游轮出现在他们的中世纪周围。

sense_info_list.en: take part in a film; play; television programme; or others

word_usage.usage: appear不能用于进行时，可用一般现在时表示目前的状况。
appear用作系动词，接“to be+ n./adj. ” 或者介词短语、动词不定式或as if/though引导的从句，to be可以省略。当形容词是表语形容词时，to be不可省略。
appear用作系动词时，只能与形容词连用，不能与副词连用。

appear作“出现”解时，是不及物动词，不能与形容词连用。
他常常是不速之客，而且来了坐下就吃。
误 He often appeared unexpected and invited himself to lunch.
正 He often appeared unexpectedly and invited himself to lunch.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指朦胧出现，好像从雾中浮现出来一样。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不见；消失；不复存在；失踪；被杀害；丢失；被盗；不再使用
v. 消失；看不见；不再存在；不再使用；丢失；无法找到；失踪；被杀害
n. 面貌；外表；外观；参演；参与；露面；到来；出现；产生；问世

word_family.mean: v. 进入视野；出现；显现；看上去；留下…的印象；产生；体现；问世；开始被使用；出版

sense_info_list.en: come into sight; come into existence; arrive at a place

examination_example.sentence: As the twins looked around them in disappointment, their father <highlight>appeared</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当这对双胞胎失望地环顾四周时，他们的父亲出现了。

examination_example.sentence: Tech company UneeQ is heading for its "digital humans" , which <highlight>appear</highlight> life like on the screen because of facial movements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科技公司UneeQ正朝着它的“数字人类”方向发展，由于面部动作，这种“数字人类”在屏幕上看起来栩栩如生。

examination_example.sentence: Some of your interests may not <highlight>appear</highlight> to be connected but, once you explore their depths, you discover that they are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的一些兴趣可能看起来并不相关，但一旦你深入探索，你会发现它们是相关的。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 好像; 似乎; 看上去

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不见；消失；不复存在；失踪；被杀害；丢失；被盗；不再使用
v. 消失；看不见；不再存在；不再使用；丢失；无法找到；失踪；被杀害
n. 面貌；外表；外观；参演；参与；露面；到来；出现；产生；问世

word_family.mean: v. 进入视野；出现；显现；看上去；留下…的印象；产生；体现；问世；开始被使用；出版

sense_info_list.en: come into sight; come into existence; arrive at a place

examination_example.sentence: Tea didn't <highlight>appear</highlight> in England until around the 16th century.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到16世纪左右，茶叶才在英国出现。

examination_example.sentence: When did the Four Famous Ink Stones <highlight>appear</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 四大名是什么时候出现的？

examination_example.sentence: A month later, one day in August (八月) 2016, Harris <highlight>appeared</highlight> in Charlie's classroom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个月后，2016 年八月的一天，哈里斯出现在查理的教室。

sense_info_list.zh: 好像; 似乎; 看上去

examination_example.sentence: Let your writing <highlight>appear</highlight> nice and clean.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让你的字迹看上去漂亮整洁。

examination_example.sentence: And if you decide to run for class president at your school, you will need to <highlight>appear</highlight> confident (自信).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你决定竞选你们学校的班长，你需要表现出自信。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>appeared</highlight> to be a wealthy gentleman while he really was a poor painter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他看上去是个富有的绅士，而实际上是个穷画家。

sense_info_list.en: take part in a film, play, television programme, or others

examination_example.sentence: He was even invited to <highlight>appear</highlight> on television.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他甚至被邀请在电视上露面。

examination_example.sentence: But, when Chibi <highlight>appeared</highlight> on the stage at the talent show of that year, no one could believe his eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，当Chibi出现在当年大奖赛的舞台上时，没有人能相信自己的眼睛。

word_usage.usage: appear用作系动词，接“to be+ n./adj. ” 或者介词短语、动词不定式或as if/though引导的从句，to be可以省略。当形容词是表语形容词时，to be不可省略。
appear用作系动词时，只能与形容词连用，不能与副词连用。

appear作“出现”解时，是不及物动词，不能与形容词连用。
他常常是不速之客，而且来了坐下就吃。
误 He often appeared unexpected and invited himself to lunch.
正 He often appeared unexpectedly and invited himself to lunch.
appear不能用于进行时，可用一般现在时表示目前的状况。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指从感观印象看似乎是如此，但有时着重指因视野、观点限制而产生的歪曲印象。
指从样子看起来，侧重通过视觉而建立的印象。
多指从主观印象或个反应得出的看法。
